meanings.definition: To disconnect from a computer network or system.
meanings.sent1: After finishing my work, I always logoff from the computer.
meanings.sent2: Remember to logoff properly to keep your information safe.
meanings.sent3: I tried to logoff from the game, but it kept pulling me back in!
meanings.sent4: As the day ended, she felt like it was time to logoff from the chaos of the world.
meanings.sent5: The button to logoff glowed invitingly, promising peace and quiet.

meanings.definition: The act of logging off from a computer network or system.
meanings.sent1: I always click on the logoff button before leaving the computer.
meanings.sent2: Make sure you do a proper logoff to avoid any issues.
meanings.sent3: The logoff screen popped up just as he was about to win the game.
meanings.sent4: His logoff was like a graceful exit from a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The logoff process was quick and smooth, like closing a book at the end of a story.
